/** @format */ import React, { useState, useRef } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Button, } from "reactstrap"; import { Link, NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import "../../styles/header.css"; const navLinks = [ { path: "/home", display: "Trang chủ", }, { path: "/about", display: "Về Rent Car Service", }, { path: "/cars", display: "Phương tiện", }, { path: "/blogs", display: "Blog", }, { path: "/contact", display: "Liên hệ", }, ]; const Header = () => { const menuRef = useRef(null); const [modalLogin, setModalLogin] = useState(false); const [modalRegister, setModalRegister] = useState(false); const toggleMenu = () => menuRef.current.classList.toggle("menu__active"); const toggleModalLogin = () => setModalLogin(!modalLogin); const toggleModalRegister = () => setModalRegister(!modalRegister); return (
{/* =============== header middle =========== */}
